resources.string:
Get Contact app deals with getting a mobile number of a person by just specifying the name.This is a useful application when we forget our mobile and are desperately in need of a contact.
 
 Sounds interesting?? Just follow these steps to get started with this app...
 
 1. Set your 4-digit pin. 
 
 2. In need of contact just send an SMS from any mobile phone available near you. 
 
 3. The above SMS must contain the name of the person whose contact you want along with the 4-digit pin at the end.
 
 4. If the contact is available in your contact list then it will be sent, else no reply is sent. 
 
 5. You can also change your pin by clicking on the lock icon in the action bar.
